Detailed Description

The QuickTipsWidget overlap on actual application and can teach user how to use this application easier. 

  class MyQuickTipsWidget : public gaia::ui::QuickTipsWidget {
    public:
      QuickTipsWidgetTest* mPage;
      MyQuickTipsWidget(EmptyPageTest* pPage) { mPage = pPage; };
      void prepareTips(bool portrait, gaia::ui::QuickTipsContent* tips, int pageIndex) {
          Scene* scene = mpPage->getSceneSingleton();
          int32_t screenWidth =  scene->getResources()->getDisplayMetrics().getWidthPixels();
          int32_t screenHeight = scene->getResources()->getDisplayMetrics().getHeightPixels();

          if (portrait) {
              // In Portrait mode
              if (pageIndex == 0) {
                  // Case 1: Use res id.
                  int resId = SDKWidgetTest::R::id::button2;
                  tips->addTip(resId, String("top right of screen tips sample"));
              } else if(pageIndex == 1) {
                  // Case 2: Just Use String, default will show on center of screen.
                  tips->addTip(String("center of screen tips sample"));
              }
           } else {
              // In Landscape mode
              if (pageIndex ==0) {
                  // Case 3: Use widget as anchor.
                  tips->addTip(*mpPage->mpBtnShow, String("關閉或重新開啟鍵盤"));
              } else if(pageIndex == 1) {
                  // Case 4: Use Rect, you can assign tips on any location of screen.
                  Rect* rect = new Rect(0, 2*screenHeight/25, screenWidth/10, 2*screenHeight/20);
                  tips->addTip(rect, String("top left tips using rectangle"));
                  delete rect;
              }
           }
       }
  };

  void QuickTipsWidgetTest::onInit(Persistence* const p) {
      mpScene = Scene::SceneFactory(static_cast<Page*>(this));

      mpContext = new Context(this);
      LayoutInflater* mpInflater = new LayoutInflater(mpContext);
      if (mpInflater == NULL) {
         GLOG(LOG_TAG, LOGER, "Failed to new LayoutInflater");
      }

      // Initial the Layout of QuickTips
      WidgetController*  mpWidgetController = dynamic_cast<WidgetController*>(mpInflater->inflate(
           SDKWidgetTest::R::layout::quick_tips));

      mpScene->attachController(mpWidgetController);
      mpScene->setupSceneLayout();

      // Create QuickTipsWidget instance about 2 page in ViewPager.
      gaia::ui::QuickTipsWidget* mpQuickTips = new MyQuickTipsWidget(this, 2);

      mpBtnShow = dynamic_cast<Button*>(
             mpWidgetController->findWidgetById(SDKWidgetTest::R::id::button1));

  }
